title: shaco boxes need a texture update too
body: I noticed on the pbe that teemo texture update included a snazzy update to his mushrooms. Making them look less Nintendo 64 and more up to par graphically with the rest of particles of its type. With shaco also receiving his texture update (which look great by the way) would rito consider adding in new textures or models for shaco boxes to match his skins? Even a recolor would satisfy me and I am certain other shaco players.
